-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, March 01, 2007 1:10 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3281615F] Notice of Intellectual Property Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Thu, 01 Mar 2007 07:55:56 -0500 Received: from ATLMSG30.turner.com ([10.189.216.161]) by ATLBH02.turner.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.211); Thu, 1 Mar 2007 07:55:55 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C75C00.F331DF4D" Subject: Notice of Intellectual Property Infringement Date: Thu, 1 Mar 2007 07:55:55 -0500 Message-ID: <5BE18843E28F4549B0A143A2546401CFA0B527@ATLMSG30.turner.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Notice of Intellectual Property Infringement Thread-Index: AcdcAPNBwcsLrJkuTXCmi7Pgnfo2Gw== From: "Moeller, Kari" To: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 Mar 2007 12:55:55.0663 (UTC) FILETIME=[F365A9F0:01C75C00] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) This is to notify you that the web page at , which appears to be hosted by The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc., infringes upon the copyrights and trademark rights held by Turner Network Television, Inc. ("TNT") in its "The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines" property. This use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property right owner, TNT, its agents, or the law. We request that the page be immediately disabled. Under penalty of perjury, I hereby declare that this Notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of TNT. Thank you, Kari L. Moeller, Counsel Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. One CNN Center NT 1314B Atlanta, Georgia 30303 T/ 404.827.2211 F/ 404.827.1995 kari.moeller@turner.com The information contained in this message is intended only for the use of the addressee and may be legally privileged and/or confidential.
